title: 5-year-old pauses her makeup tutorial to eat a cookie and we can relate
text:
The world of beauty video blogging can be a crowded space but one 5-year-old created a makeup tutorial that will make you stop and smile.

Rose, better known as Rose Knows on her YouTube channel, posted an informative video titled "Rose knows best make up video ever!"

As she goes through the steps for achieving her look, she takes a few moments to enjoy a cookie as well as some orange juice.

The pure joy on her face as she eats and drinks is infatuating.

"You have to have a little break," she says before thanking viewers for watching her video and sealing her look with a few swipes of lip gloss and brushing her hair down.

Rose also drops other gems of advice earlier in her tutorial, and it just keeps getting better as she finishes out her rosy-cheeked look.

She warns that if you don't have the Nivea face cream she has you can't apply makeup without getting spots on your face.

"Before we put makeup on, ask your mummy if you have any of this," she says before demonstrating how she massages it on.

"It's really important," Rose adds.

She also advises that your eyeshadow has to look the same on both eyelids or else people will laugh at you.

"You don't want people to laugh at you, do you?," Rose asks.

This is the makeup tutorial we never knew we needed, but many are happy to have.

One fan, That Amber Chick, left a comment saying, "This is the cutest video I’ve seen in a good while! She is such a beautiful, funny girl!! Best makeup video on all of YouTube!"

Could Rose be the next big beauty YouTuber? The odds are high.
description: A 5-year-old named Rose shows off a fun makeup tutorial but pauses to take a cookie break.
